name: Line Sprint - Stickman Challenge Free
description:
*** SIMPLE & FUN ARCADE RUNNER ***
*** 100% FREE - ALL LEVELS UNLOCKED ***

You know what stickman does. He runs! He jumps! He re-spawns when you die! How far will you make it?

* Block art 2.5D environments!
* Awesome jumping, ducking and more challenges!
* Game Center Leaderboards.

Take the challenge TODAY!
